column2: "Israelmba
column3: hom ntsie nsɛm a EWURADZE ka kyerɛ hom:"

column2: "mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Mma hom nsuansua amanaman hɔn kwan no
column5: wɔ ɔsor nsɛnkyerɛdze ho; na amanaman na hɔn bo tutu wɔ ho."

column2: "Na amanaman no hɔn atɔrmuadze yɛ egyangyandze: na obi twa dua wɔ kwaa mu
column3: odwimfo ne nsaano edwuma a wɔdze ekuma yɛe."

column2: "Wɔdze dwetɛ na sika hyehyɛ no; wɔdze mprɛgow na nhamɛr bobɔ mu
column3: amma oeennhihim."

column2: "Wɔtse dɛ kakaa bi a wɔayɛ esi efɛr kwa mu
column3: na wonntum nnkasa: otwar dɛ wɔsoa hɔn
column4: osiandɛ wonntum nnantsew. Mma nnsuro hɔn
column6: eso papayɛ bi nnyi hɔn mu."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo; ɔwo na eyɛ ɔkɛse
column4: na wo dzin so so wɔ tum mu."

column2: "Amanaman Hen
column3: woana na onnkosuro wo? Ɔwo na ɔyɛ wodze: susuampaara dɛ amanaman enyansafo nyinara mu na hɔn ahendzi nyinara mu
column4: obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtse dɛ ɔwo."

column2: "Na wɔyɛ mbowadze na nkwaseadze prɛko: na ehonyi ne nkyerɛkyerɛ dze
column3: ɔtse dɛ duasin ara a."

column2: "Dwetɛ a wɔabor no trɛtrɛ fi Tarsis ba
column3: na sika a ofi Ufaz
column4: ɔyɛ odwimfo na sikadwimfo ne nsaano edwuma; bibir na ɔberdum nye hɔn efuradze; ne nyinara edwimfo enyansafo edwuma a."

column2: "Naaso EWURADZE nye nokwar Nyankopɔn; ɔno nye Nyankopɔn tseasefo na ɔdomankoma hen no. No bo fuw a
column3: asaase wosow
column4: na amanaman nntum n’ebufuhyew enyim gyina."

column2: "Iyi na hom nka nkyerɛ hɔn: Abosom a nnyɛ hɔn bi na wɔyɛɛ ɔsor na asaase no
column3: wɔbɛsɛɛ efi asaase do

column2: "Ɔno na ɔdze no tum ayɛ asaase
column3: ɔno na ɔdze ne nyansaa etsintsim wiadze
column4: na ɔdze ne ntseasee atserɛw ɔsorsor mu."

column2: "Sɛ ɔbɔ ne ndze mu a
column3: esuesu no weɔɔyɛ ba ɔsorsor
column4: na ɔma ehubɔhubɔw tu fi asaase ano fa sor; ɔno na ɔyɛ enyinam na nyankom
column5: na ɔdze mframa fi n’adzekorabea ba."

column2: "Nyimpa biara adan kwasea na onnyim dze; sikadwinnyi biara no honyi a woesian hyɛ no enyito: na no honyi a woegu no yɛ ator
column3: na ahom biara nnyi hɔn mu."

column2: "Wɔyɛ egyangyandze
column3: ndaadaa edwuma a: hɔn asotweber mu no wɔbɛsɛɛ."

column2: "Jakob ne kyɛfa no dze ɔnntse dɛ iyinom; na ɔno nye adze nyinara ne hyehyɛfo; na Israel nye n’egyapadze ebusuakuw: dɔm EWURADZE nye ne dzin."
"Ɔwo a etse kurow a woetua no mu
column3: boaboa w’ahodze ano fi asaase no do."

column2: "Na mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Mobɔtow asaase no do nkorɔfo no tsiabo akyerɛkyerɛ dɛm aber yi mu

column2: "Mundue wɔ me pira ntsi! Me pirakur yɛ yaayaw; naaso mesee dɛ
column3: Ampaara iyi nye me yaw

column2: "Me ntamadan asɛɛ
column3: na me ntampehoma nyinara atsetsew: me mba efi me nkyɛn kɔ
column4: na wonnyi hɔ: obiara nnyi hɔ a ɔtserɛw me ntamadan mu bio
column5: na ɔasese me ntamadan ho nkataho no."

column2: "Na nguanhwɛfo no adan nkwasea
column3: na wommbisa EWURADZE ekyir kwan: dɛm ntsi na ennsi hɔn yie
column4: na hɔn mbowakuw nyinara apetse yi."

column2: "Tsie dedeedeyɛ bi
column3: hwɛ ɔreba
column4: na asakrabutuw kɛse bi a ofi kwaamu afamu asaase do
column5: dɛ ɔrebɛma Juda nkurow ayɛ nkurofo

column2: "Ao EWURADZE
column3: minyim dɛ ɔdasanyi no kwan nnyi nankasa ne nsamu: onnyi ɔdasanyi a ɔnam ne nsamu mbrɛ obodua etutu n’anamɔn."

column2: "EWURADZE
column3: tsea me
column4: na mbom wɔ pɛrpɛryɛ mu a; nnyɛ ebufuw mu a

column2: "Hue w’ebufuhyew gu aman a wonnyim wo no do
column3: na mbusua a wɔmmbɔ wo dzin no do: osiandɛ wɔamen Jakob
column6: na wɔama ne tsenabea ayɛ amamfo."
